thought: To craft light_blue_concrete_powder, I need to first craft white_dye and light_blue_dye. To craft white_dye, I need to place 1 bone_meal in the crafting grid. I have 1 bone_meal in slot 40, so I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1
